reviews.text: Clear golden beer, small white head, grain aromas, medium light body, soft malt aromas, low bitterness, pretty much what is expected from a macro lager

Cloudy dark orange beer, low carbonation with a small white head, nice aromas of banana, and vanilla, nice taste with a better balance malt hops, but as it is expected for an german Hefeweizen the malt flavors prevail and at the end a slight bitterness can be perceived. Sadly in palate the perception is rather watery.
A light lager with a good flavor, clear golden white and stable head, malt aromas, some yeast aromas. Light body, good bitter finish. For a light is pretty good.
